title: Bug 22809[Properties dialog] Repos Properties Info Dialog Labels do not resize with dialog.
description: Bug 22809[Properties dialog] Repos Properties Info Dialog Labels do not resize with dialog.
OB: (4) Observe that the labels are NOT resized with the dialog.Thank you,Gary
SR: (1) In the Resource Perspective's Navigator pane, select a file deep in adirectory tree. (2) Open a Properties dialog that file. (3) Resize the dialog to try see the full file "Path" and "Location".
